name: Love Is Blind (Yanergy)
description:
Made for the Brackeys Game Jam #2

This game has 2 gamemodes

-1: Defender
You have to defend you love from the creepy little black hearts for as long as possible. Everything will be with a blindness effect.

-2: Telporter:
You have to get to your love within 5 minutes and try to not get killed by the black hearts. If you get close, you will be blinded.

Best of luck and have fun playing!

- Yanergy
